Text.Page: The {@LinkCreature:40#18#violent mycanars} are victims of the mutation plague, too. A study of their cores might reveal much about the sickness. Will <PCNAME> obtain a few mycanodules for me?
So that's what they look like. Well, I'll get right to work.
Kill the {@LinkCreature:40#18#violent mycanars}, and bring me their nodules. I cannot do this without them.
